headline: Assessing M&T Bank (MTB) Valuation After Recent Share Price Volatility
summary: Why M&T Bank stock is on investors’ radar M&T Bank (MTB) has drawn attention after its recent share price moves, with the stock showing a mix of short term volatility and steadier returns over the past year and beyond. See our latest analysis for M&T Bank. Recent trading has been choppy, with a 1 day share price return of 1.67% decline and a 7 day share price return of 0.73%. However, the 90 day share price return of 16.89% and 1 year total shareholder return of 10.73% suggest momentum has...
